Scriptal.Name: Fade Out To Black
Scriptal.Description: The screen fades to black, as though a cutscene or a loading screen begins.

Choice.Name: Sender
Choice.Description: When the fade out is completed, a "EndFadeOut" message is sent. This value will be the name of the sender.

Choice.Name: Fade-Out Time (Seconds)
Choice.Description: The amount of time in seconds before the screen is completely faded out.
